gameDetails.name: Zombicide: Box of Zombies â€“ Set #1: Walk of the Dead
gameDetails.description:
This box includes 24 zombies and 12 additional "Walk of the Dead" spawn cards to add them into any Zombicide base game.

All zombie sculpts from this box are the same as the original Zombicide.

The Zombies breakdown
15 Walkers
6 Runners
3 Fatties

i.e. 3 of each Zombie sculpt from Season 1 other than the Abomination.

The Spawn cards consist of #43 to #54 - otherwise known as the "Romero" set - and contain only Walkers.
